MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH22 area of Dalkeith. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:02am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to our underground electricity network near the Newbattle Abbey substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:33am on Sunday, 28 March 2021
